creator: ekirkco@uark.edu
text:
Caused by: org.xml.sax.SAXNotRecognizedException: Feature
'http://apache.org/xml/features/dom/include-ignorable-whitespace' is not
recognized. 
at org.apache.xerces.parsers.AbstractSAXParser.getFeature(Unknown Source) 
at org.apache.xerces.jaxp.SAXParserImpl$JAXPSAXParser.setFeature(Unknown Source) 
at org.dom4j.io.SAXReader.setFeature(SAXReader.java:218) 
at edu.uark.dom.DOMBase.getSAXReader(DOMBase.java:1000) 
at edu.uark.dom.DOMBase.getDocument(DOMBase.java:1021) ... 17 more

creator: mrglavas@ca.ibm.com
text:
This isn't a bug. This feature [1] is only recognized by Xerces' DOM parser. 
Note that W3C DOM and DOM4J are not the same thing. Also, XmlCommons isn't the 
right place for reporting bugs against Xerces-J. You should report them here 
[2] instead.

[1] http://xerces.apache.org/xerces2-j/features.html#dom.include-ignorable-
whitespace
[2] http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/XERCESJ
